rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: In the U.S., a patient in Missouri was diagnosed with bird flu in September. This [Missouri patient case] marks the 14th person (in three states) to contract bird flu in the U.S. this year and the first infection to occur without any reported exposure to sick or infected animals, the CDC alert stated.
